Document: # Rule 3.6 - Stay within your job, reasonable knowledge, and abilities. - Do not use knowledge that you have learned out-of-character while you are in-character. - Unless your character has a past in a particular line of work, they should not know how to do jobs outside of their own. - Do not do the jobs of other people for them, only play the role you signed up for. If you want to work a different job, ask the Head of Personnel for a job change. Exceptions can be made for if no active staff exist for a department. - Characters may change jobs from time to time, but not from shift to shift.
